class.name: Button
class.description: Button is the standard themed button. It can contain text and an icon, and will display them according to the current [Theme].

method.name: get_clip_text
method.description: Return the state of the [i]clip_text[/i] property (see [method set_clip_text])

method.name: is_flat
method.description: Return the state of the [i]flat[/i] property (see [method set_flat]).

method.name: set_button_icon
method.description: Set the icon that will be displayed next to the text inside the button area.

method.name: set_clip_text
method.description: Set the [i]clip_text[/i] property of a Button. When this property is enabled, text that is too large to fit the button is clipped, when disabled (default) the Button will always be wide enough to hold the text.

method.name: set_flat
method.description: Set the [i]flat[/i] property of a Button. Flat buttons don't display decoration unless hovered or pressed.

method.name: set_text
method.description: Set the button text, which will be displayed inside the button area.

method.name: set_text_align
method.description: Set the text alignment policy, using one of the ALIGN_* constants.

constants.constant: Align the text to the left.
Align the text to the right.
